name: UpdateIpAllowlist
description:
Edit and toggle the IP allowlist settings in Datadog.

This tool updates the entries in the Datadog IP allowlist, enabling or disabling it as needed.

parameters.name: ip_allowlist_data
parameters.description: JSON object with allowlist details: attributes (enabled, entries) and metadata (id, type).

enabled.description: Whether the IP allowlist logic is enabled or not.

cidr_block.description: The CIDR block describing the IP range of the entry.

note.description: A note describing the IP allowlist entry.

attributes.description: Attributes of the IP allowlist entry.

id.description: The unique identifier of the IP allowlist entry.

data.description: Data of the IP allowlist entry object.

entries.description: Array of entries in the IP allowlist.

id.description: The unique identifier of the org.
